name: ychart-editor
description: A flexible organizational chart editor with YAML-based data management

scripts.build:prod: pnpm build && sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html/dist && sudo cp -r dist/* /var/www/html/dist/ && COMMIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && COMMIT_FULL=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && sed -e "s/>loading\.\.\.</>$COMMIT_HASH</g" -e "s|href=\"#\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" title=\"View this commit on GitHub\"|href=\"https://github.mieweb.com/mieweb/YChart/commit/$COMMIT_FULL\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" title=\"View commit $COMMIT_HASH on GitHub\"|g" production.html | sudo tee /var/www/html/index.html > /dev/null
